titleStmt.title: The city-remonstrance remonstrated. Or An answer to Colonell John Bellamy, his Vindication thereof, in justification of The moderate reply to the city-remonstrance. / By I.P.
titleStmt.author: Price, John, Citizen of London.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Paine, for Henry Overton, and are to be sold at his shop at the entring into Popes head alley out of Lumbard street.,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Bellamie, John. A vindication of the Humble remonstrance and petition of the Lord Major, aldermen, and commons, of the city of London, in Common-Councell assembled, presented to both Houses of Parliament, the 26 of May, 1646 (Wing B1818).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the entring into Popes head alley out of Lumbard street.
